statements: UPDATE player_statistics SET total_score = 500 WHERE player_id = 'b1698127-7aa5-44a9-bbb0-0700223276a6';
UPDATE player_statistics SET games_played = 15, total_score = 750, achievements = '{"level1": true, "level2": true}' WHERE player_name = 'John Smith';
UPDATE player_statistics SET total_score = total_score + 100 WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE player_statistics SET player_name = 'John Doe', games_played = games_played + 1, achievements = achievements || '{"level": 10}' WHERE player_id = '98765432-1011-1213-1415-161718192021';
UPDATE players SET total_score = 500 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE achievements SET achievement_points = 100, achievement_name = 'New Achievement' WHERE achievement_id = 5;
UPDATE players SET total_score = total_score + 10 WHERE player_id = 1
UPDATE achievements SET achievement_points = 1000, achievement_name = 'Master Achiever' WHERE player_id = 2
UPDATE players SET player_rating = 8.5 WHERE player_id = 123;
UPDATE player_stats SET games_played = 20, total_score = 500 WHERE player_id = 456;
UPDATE players SET player_rating = 4.5, player_name = 'John Doe' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE achievements SET achievement_points = 1000, achievement_name = 'Master Achiever' WHERE achievement_id = 5;
UPDATE players SET player_score = player_score + 100 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE achievements SET achievement_description = 'New Description' WHERE achievement_id = 2;
UPDATE players SET player_score = player_score + 100 WHERE player_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE player_achievements SET achievement_date = '2023-01-01' WHERE player_id = 1 AND achievement_id = 5;
UPDATE players SET player_score = 1000 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE achievements SET points = 50, achievement_name = 'High Score' WHERE achieve_id = 1;
UPDATE players SET player_score = player_score + 10 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_stats SET win_count = win_count + 1, loss_count = loss_count - 1 WHERE player_id = 2;
